participant_1.background:
I grew up with my mother and dogs and now we are close.
I am from a place where rain is always welcome.
I lost my job but I am grateful for the support of my friends and family.
I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal.
i love lasagna like i m garfield.

participant_2.background:
My most valuable thing is my ability to stay humble, even in the face of great wealth.
i play bingo every wednesday with my husband.
i am a civil war reenactment participant.
yellow is my favorite color.
I am a creative person who enjoys making jewelry.

content.text: Doing well, thanks! How about yourself?
I am doing well, thanks for asking!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to write, read, and spend time with my family.
That sounds nice! I like to play bingo with my husband and I am a civil war reenactment participant.
That is really interesting! How did you get into that?
I have always been interested in history and I love learning about the Civil War. I started doing reenactments as a way to get more involved with the history and it has been a lot of fun!
That is great! I love it when people are passionate about something.
Thanks! I am glad you think so!
What is your favorite part about being a civil war reenactment participant?
I love getting to learn about the history and meet other people who are interested in it. I also enjoy the challenge of learning how to use the weapons and equipment from the Civil War.
That sounds really fun! I would love to try it sometime.
You should! It is a lot of fun and you learn a lot.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion
